QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, n.note_date, n.encid, 'sds_term:' || COALESCE(n.sds_term, '') || 'sds_location:' || COALESCE(n.sds_location, '') || 'sds_family_member:' || COALESCE(n.sds_family_member, '') || ';sds_sentiment:' || COALESCE(n.sds_sentiment, '') as note_text, 'NLP_SDS_FAMILY' as note_title, n.note_section, 40639387 as language_concept_id, ch.PartitionId from {sc}.nlp_sds_family n JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by ch.PartitionId, 1
